text: Francisco Dias Alves (20 January 1936 – 24 February 2022) was a Brazilian politician. He was a member of the Brazilian Democratic Movement. He was in the Chamber of Deputies from 1982 to 1988. Dias Alves was born in Baturité, Brazil. He was a member of the Legislative Assembly of São Paulo from 1978 until 1982. Dias Alves died in Guarulhos, Brazil on 24 February 2022, at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Politicians from Ceará Category:Brazilian Democratic Movement politicians
title: Francisco Dias Alves
